title: py-h5py depends on hdf5+mpi because parsing of depends_on('hdf5@1.8.4:+hl') fails
body:
When trying to build `pu-astropy` I found a hard requirement on `hdf5+mpi` by `py-h5py`:

```
[centos@cvmfs-rhel6-build-machine osg]$ spack install -j 16 py-astropy ^py-numpy +blas ^openblas virtual_machine=True threads=pthreads ^python@3.6.2 ^hdf5~mpi+hl
==> Error: An unsatisfiable variant constraint has been detected for spec:

    hdf5@1.10.1%gcc@5.3.0~cxx~debug~fortran+hl~mpi+pic+shared~szip~threadsafe arch=linux-rhel6-x86_64


while trying to concretize the partial spec:

    py-h5py@2.6.0%gcc@5.3.0+mpi arch=linux-rhel6-x86_64
        ^py-pkgconfig@1.2.2%gcc@5.3.0 arch=linux-rhel6-x86_64
            ^pkgconf@1.3.10%gcc@5.3.0 arch=linux-rhel6-x86_64
            ^py-setuptools@35.0.2%gcc@5.3.0 arch=linux-rhel6-x86_64
                ^py-appdirs@1.4.0:
                    ^python@3.6.2%gcc@5.3.0+pic+shared~tk~ucs4 arch=linux-rhel6-x86_64
                        ^bzip2@1.0.6%gcc@5.3.0+shared arch=linux-rhel6-x86_64
                        ^ncurses@6.0%gcc@5.3.0~symlinks arch=linux-rhel6-x86_64
                        ^openssl@1.0.2k%gcc@5.3.0 arch=linux-rhel6-x86_64
                            ^zlib@1.2.11%gcc@5.3.0+optimize+pic+shared arch=linux-rhel6-x86_64
                        ^readline@7.0%gcc@5.3.0 arch=linux-rhel6-x86_64
                        ^sqlite@3.21.0%gcc@5.3.0 arch=linux-rhel6-x86_64
                ^py-packaging@16.8:
                    ^py-pyparsing@2.2.0%gcc@5.3.0 arch=linux-rhel6-x86_64
                    ^py-six@1.10.0%gcc@5.3.0 arch=linux-rhel6-x86_64


py-h5py requires hdf5 variant +mpi, but spec asked for ~mpi
```

When looking deeper I found

```
depends_on('hdf5@1.8.4:+hl')
depends_on('hdf5+mpi', when='+mpi')
```
somehow the parsing of the `depends_on('hdf5@1.8.4:+hl')` expression is having issues
